# HUD::ADD_BLIP_FOR_COORD

## Summary
Add Radar blip at coordinate

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** coorsX
* **FLOAT** coorsY
* **FLOAT** coorsZ

## Returns
* **BLIP_INDEX**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Creates an orange ( default ) Blip-object. Returns a Blip-object which can then be modified.
